publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3366 Mr Brian Monteith: The Success of Scottish Hockey-That the Parliament recognises the outstanding success of Scottish hockey and congratulates the Scottish Under-18 Men's and Women's teams on their promotions to Division A of the European Youth Trophy, the Scotland Under-21 Men's and Women's teams for winning their respective Junior Celtic Cup trophies and the Scotland's Women's team for winning the Women's Celtic Cup; notes that both male and female senior teams have qualified for the European Nations Cup finals in Spain in 2003, and wishes them every success.
S1M-3366 The Success of Scottish Hockey (lodged on 6 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3366 The Success of Scottish Hockey (lodged on 6 September 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3366 The Success of Scottish Hockey (lodged on 6 September 2002) Karen Gillon*
S1M-3366 The Success of Scottish Hockey (lodged on 6 September 2002) Scott Barrie*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3366 The Success of Scottish Hockey (lodged on 6 September 2002) Murdo Fraser*
